snippet: N.H.L. Commissioner Gary Bettman announced that a preliminary deal had been reached to sell the Phoenix Coyotes.
abstract: Roundup; NHL commissioner Gary Bettman announces that a preliminary deal has been reached to sell the Phoenix Coyotes. (M)
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Gary Bettman announced Monday night that a preliminary deal had been reached to sell the Phoenix Coyotes. The N.H.L. bought the Coyotes out of bankruptcy in 2009 for about $140 million and plans to sell the team to a group led by Greg Jamison, who previously ran the San Jose Sharks.
